item.title: CVE-2024-32099|2024-04-15T08:54:08.665Z -- James Ward -- WP Mail Catcher
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in James Ward WP Mail Catcher.This issue affects WP Mail Catcher: from n/a through 2.1.6.
